extendedInfo.description: Voice Call Recorder can record all your calls in a very easy way and you can easily manage all your call records, too.1. Record your calls automatically while calling.2. Organize your records. You can view all your calls with options like by list by time, group by names or group by dates.3. You can play back, or save your call to mp3 files on your SD card.4. Itâs FREE!Note: this app might not be able to record calls on Android 4.0.3, if your phone is Android 4.0.3, please update it to the newest version (4.1 or higher)This app might not be working when you are using other apps to record something, such as wechat, LINE: Free Calls & Messages, voice recorder, you could try turn on the "compatible mode" in this app to fix this problem.Keywords:voice recorder phone recorder communication tools battery saver power saver silver linings playbook wallpaper finish line club penguin kay jewelers jewel osco ninja kiwi northern tool locks of love call logs call history time warner cable tv angie s list reverse phone lookup call of duty elite easy bib dominion power portland press herald snapshot foot locker switched at birth walmart money card

reviews.title: Thumbs up!
reviews.comment: This tool is really helpful for documentation purposes. The only thing I wanted this App to have is a crystal clear record, regardless of whether the headset is plugged in or not. This is something you can aim to achieve in the future. Still, thumbs up for this cool app!

reviews.comment: sorry i can\'t rate this a 5...i would like the option to record certain calls only and at the precise moment...also there is a loud hissing static in the beginning...and the sound is quite tinny...other than that...

reviews.title: Sweet
reviews.comment: Fun app, nice to prove my point, my husband \'\'forgets\'\'...alot! Great way to reinerate in his own words, i hav found i get better recordings on speaker and it doesnt record the person i\'m talking too when i use my bluetooth, and,it starts recording immediately so if u talk to urself or others begore someone picks up u are recorded saying that too quite comical, like i said fun app,!
